@notice cancel allows an NFT owner/ auction creator to cancle their auction
@param _auctionID is the number representing the auction that is being cancled*

params._denominator: is the denominator of the equation
params._numerator: is the numerator of the equation
params._precision: is a precision point to ensure that decimals dont trail outside what the EVM can handle*

acceptBid(uint256,uint256).details: this function allows an NFT owner to accept ANY placed bid regardless of if it is the highest bid or not*

params._auctionID: is the number representing the Auction where the bid is placed
params._bidID: is the number representing the bid being accepted

params._IPFShash: is an optional IPFS hash that allows a bidder to relay a message to the NFT owner*
params._auctionID: is the number representing the ID of the auction being bid on
params._bidAmount: is the ERC20 amount being placed as a bid for the auction

params._auctionID: is the number representing the auction that is being cancled*
is the number representing the auction that is being cancled
params._bidID: is the number representing the users bid*

params._NFTcontract: is the address of the NFT contract whos token is being auctioned
params._amount: is an amount of NFTs to be transfered(1155 only, set to 0 if ERC721)
params._bidERC20: is the address of the ERC20 contract this auction will be held in
params._callData: is the relevant call data for the NFT if it is ERC1155(leave blank if ERC721)*
params._is1155: is a bool representing whether or not the NFT being auctioned is ERC1155
params._startPrice: is the starting price of the auction priced in the bid ERC20 token
params._tokenId: is the ID of the NFT token(s) being auctioned

params._ERC20FeeAdd: is the address of the ERC20 contract NFT will be purchased in
params._NFTContractAdd: is the address of the NFT contract they own
params._feePercentage: is the percentage of a sale that will be collected in fee's
params._isZNS: is a bool representing whether or not the NFT set is a ZNS domain*
params._znsID: is the ZNS ID for a ZNS domain

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}.     * Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.

params._auctionID: is the number representing the auction that is being cancled
params._bidID: is the number representing the users bid*

_percent(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: percent is an internal function used to calculate the ratio between a given numerator && denominator

acceptBid(uint256,uint256).notice: acceptBid allows an NFT owner/auctioner to accept a placed bid

bid(uint256,uint256,string).notice: bid allows any user to bid on an auction

cancel(uint256).notice: cancel allows an NFT owner/ auction creator to cancle their auction

cancelBid(uint256,uint256).notice: cancelBid allows a bidder to cancel their bid

createAuction(address,address,uint256,ui.notice: createAuction allows a NFT owner to create an auction for both a 721 and 1155 NFT

setCreatorFees(address,address,uint256,u.notice: setCreatorFees allows the owner of an NFT contract OR the owner of a ZNS domain to set a creator fee for all sales of their NFTs through the platform

viewBid(uint256,uint256).notice: viewBid allows for the front end to easily retreive a specific bids info
